complaint.suggestion: Improve security measures to prevent unauthorized sim swops

meta.review_content:
Dear Vodacom,
Please stop using ROBOTS to do your work. Your security is up to ****. How the hell is it possible that someone random can just do a sim swop on your behalf with your number? We should report Vodacom for fraud because of YOU someone can easily access your banking info. If there is money gone from someone's account because of your hopeless security in doing sim swops - who is going to refund that money?
